install.name: GraphicMail Subscription Form
install.author: Masroor Sadiq
install.description: Allows the user to sign up for a GraphicMail mailing list.

param.name: GMAPIusername
param.label: API Username
param.description: Your GraphicMail Username for authentication of your account for your maillists.

param.name: GMAPIpassword
param.label: API Password
param.description: Your GraphicMail Password for authentication of your account for your maillists.

param.name: GMSelectedMailingList
param.label: Select Mailing List
param.description: Show the name of your GraphicMail list in the signup module.

param.name: GMFrontEndBlurb
param.default: Please provide a valid email address for the following mailing list.
param.label: Mailinglist heading
param.description: Show this text on frontend for header text of selected mailing list.
